intro: Vangueria gossweileri, commonly known as the Cape vangueria, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a shrub or small tree that typically grows in rocky or sandy soils. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are usually simple, alternate, and have a slightly hairy texture. Vangueria gossweileri is adapted to arid environments and is often found in coastal regions.
